**Ynot** (Why not!) is a **Quarto website** of its own with a feature **storing infos** as *issues*, that are anchored to any pages of my other websites.

Ynot is build with *quarto render* and sourced from <https://github.com/fischerpj/ynot.git> and locally docker v2519/ynot (deprecated rv5/ynot)
